channel.title: Posts on Khanh Nghiem
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Khanh Nghiem

item.title: FKA twigs – MAGDALENE (2019)
item.description: Genres: Art pop, electronic In our current time, I can’t think of any artist as multi-talented as FKA twigs. Since her critically acclaimed LP1 that reset the bar for experimental R&B, accompanied by avant-garde music videos with breath-taking art direction and masterful choreography (all done with twigs at the helm), she never stopped extending the limits of her talents.

item.title: Vietnam Month One Recap
item.description: I flew out of the US to Vietnam on the last day of June – exactly one month ago. I made the decision to move back to Vietnam in March 2021, which gave me 18 months to prepare for the transition.

item.title: What does it mean to love, deeply?
item.description: Dry heat from the radiator was bothering my chest. Itchy. I opened a crack in the window to let fresh New England snow wander into my dorm room. My eyes wide open, I could not fall asleep.

item.title: Why you should practice writing
item.description: Lately, I have been obsessed with Janelle Monáe. This obsession began with her latest album “Dirty Computer”. I admire how articulate and thoughtful she is with everything that she does. So I did what any true fan would do: I tried to watch as many interviews with Janelle Monáe as possible.
